content.text:
# Draft:David Kingston College

----
David Kingston College
David Kingston College is a Netherlands-based higher education institution that collaborates with accredited universities in the United Kingdom. The institution primarily offers “Top-Up” degree programmes designed for professionals over the age of 25 who wish to complete their academic studies more efficiently by using their previous qualifications and professional experience.
Overview
David Kingston College delivers programmes that allow students to convert professional experience into academic credits. This system enables exemptions from certain modules and shortens the time required to complete a degree. All programmes are delivered fully online. Graduates are eligible to attend official graduation ceremonies in the United Kingdom.
Programmes
David Kingston College offers a range of “Top-Up” degrees and diploma programmes in partnership with UK universities and qualification bodies, including:
BSc (Hons) Business Management Top-Up (Anglia Ruskin University)
MBA Top-Up (Anglia Ruskin University, University of Central Lancashire, University of Wolverhampton)
LLB (Hons) Law Top-Up (University of Central Lancashire)
LLM International Business Law Top-Up (University of Central Lancashire)
DBA Top-Up (American University of Malta)
Diploma-level qualifications from Qualifi (Levels 5–8 in Business Management, Strategic Management & Leadership, and Law)
Partnerships and Accreditation
The college works with several universities and organisations to deliver accredited UK qualifications:
Anglia Ruskin University
University of Central Lancashire
University of Wolverhampton
American University of Malta
Qualifi
Chestnut Education
Target Audience
The programmes are aimed at professionals, particularly in Turkey and Turkic countries, as well as the Turkish diaspora in Europe, who seek internationally recognised academic qualifications alongside their professional careers.
